hero.title: A movement of warmth. A journey of dignity.
hero.subtitle: Empowering tribal women in India through dignity-led development
hero.description: Apricity Life Foundation is a grassroots initiative working with tribal women in  India. Our focus is on dignity-led development—where empowerment is not a handout, but the right to thrive through one's own hands.

about.title: The Idea
about.subtitle: Women. Roots. Livelihood. Innovation. Consciousness.
content: Apricity Life is not just an organization—it's a growing community of change. We're working with tribal women to build sustainable livelihoods, preserve indigenous knowledge, and create a new kind of textile system—one that values people and planet as much as product.
We are on a mission to embed social consciousness at every stage of the textile value chain—from sourcing raw materials to dyeing, stitching, packaging, and beyond.
We're proving that rural innovation, ancestral wisdom, and ethical business can co-exist—and flourish.

items.title: Livelihood & Economic Independence
items.description: We equip tribal women with marketable skills—handicrafts, natural dyeing, tailoring, toy-making—and create pathways for them to earn with dignity through our social enterprise model.

items.title: Skill Revival & Heritage Crafts
items.description: We bring back forgotten knowledge systems—traditional weaving, natural medicine, and folk art—and help communities preserve, practice, and profit from them.

items.title: Children & Families
items.description: We support holistic family well-being through projects in children's education, nutritious food access, and safe toys and clothing production—made by the community, for the community.

items.title: Pet Project – Compassion for All Beings
items.description: Through our work with ethical pet products like handmade beds and toys, we create inclusive livelihoods while spreading compassion—beyond just humans.

items.title: Dignity over Charity
items.description: We do not give handouts. We create hand-ups.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Our materials, methods, and mindsets are rooted in care for people and planet.

items.title: Community First
items.description: We walk with, not ahead of, the people we serve. Decisions are locally driven, always.

items.title: Warmth, Always
items.description: Apricity means 'the warmth of the sun in winter.' That's what we hope to be—for communities long left in the cold.
